body_html:
@lordwarlock I find that it's nondeterministic. Sometimes I've gotten the downcast contiguous tensors error.

I've identified the bug as something wrong with the max pool 3d kernel.

One way to work around this is:
F.max_pool3d(out.clone(),(8,1,1),stride=(8,1,1),return_indices=True)

body:
@lordwarlock I find that it's nondeterministic. Sometimes I've gotten the downcast contiguous tensors error.

I've identified the bug as something wrong with the max pool 3d kernel.

One way to work around this is:
`F.max_pool3d(out.clone(),(8,1,1),stride=(8,1,1),return_indices=True)`
